instruction: Create an invention that utilizes renewable energy.
output: A new type of car powered entirely by renewable energy. It has an electric motor and uses solar panels on the roof to generate most of its energy needs. It also has a backup power source for times when the sun is not out, such as a battery or a hydrogen fuel cell. The car is designed in such a way that it can travel long distances and keep up with other cars on the road. It is also able to reduce emissions in the atmosphere and help sustain the environment.
